title: Indoor! Grilling
description:
Indoor! Grilling by Steven Raichlen

English | 2004 | ISBN: 0761133356 | 416 pages | EPUB | 5 MB

SPIT-ROASTED PRIME RIBS, crusty on the outside, moist and tender inside. Yes! CHICKEN UNDER A BRICK, heady with smoke and spice. Yes! CURRY-GRILLED LAMB KEBABS, POTATOES ROASTED IN THE ASHES, BAYOU WINGS, VANILLA-GRILLED PINEAPPLE WITH DARK RUM GLAZEÃ¢â‚¬â€all of it infused with honest-to-goodness real-grilled flavor, and all of it cooked indoors. Yes!
Bursting with bold new ideas, 270 righteous recipes, and hundreds of tips and techniquesÃ¢â‚¬â€from how to season a cast-iron grill pan to buying brisket cut from the "flat"Ã¢â‚¬â€Raichlen's Indoor!
